name: Drum Kit Acoustic
description: Professional acoustic drum kit with realistic samples and velocity layers

performance.notes: Acoustic drum kit with realistic samples. Round-robin hi-hats (8 variations) prevent machine gun effect. 16 velocity layers for dynamic range. Instant attack for transient snap. Medium decay for natural drum sound. Cymbals have long decay (1.5s) for realistic ring.
performance.technique: Load acoustic drum SoundFont. Use round-robin for hi-hats and cymbals. Velocity controls volume and tone. Hard velocity = loud, bright. Soft velocity = quiet, dark. Cymbals sustain naturally.
performance.tip: Use round-robin to prevent repetition. Vary velocity for human feel. Hard hits for accent. Soft hits for ghost notes. Cymbals need long decay.
